47a2: gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mad kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phying ba rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dga'abyung // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun nas mngon
47a3: dubyung sa mdor bstan pa yin ta/ rgyas pangan phyim mtha'i chu'i brgal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus pa// la mad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nang sangs su myong bal mi 'jigs pa ni bzhinag ga
47a4: paphyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams thas sa kyi snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la 'jug go/ de la 'jig rten gyi
47a5: khams rgya mtsho la la ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i
47a6: ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rgya mtsho grangs
47a7: med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol lan
47a8: ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do// 'jig
47b1: rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
47b2: bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni brtson 'grus
47b3: brtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do//
47b4: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' las 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes gyis rnam par spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug
47b5: pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis
47b6: rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa la 'jug
47b7: pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do// 'jig rten
47b8: gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni mi skyo bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
48a1: bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni dbyer med pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas gang nas
48a2: kyang mi g.yo'o/ / ci byeng na / mig mo pa'i seshes rnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la mi 'jigs pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha' mu'i bskal
48a3: par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang gling re re la ste 'jig/
48a4: rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brgya stong grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ni ches
48a5: mngango / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho bsod
48a6: nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa dag ni ches mang do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul/
48a7: rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur
48a8: ba thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor de de'i byang chub
48b1: sems dpa'i rgya mtsho pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur ba thob pa dag ni chas mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
48b2: rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas
48b3: la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs pa 'i du grar gyi rdzu rdzas ni gtung gid+ha mu sa po byed bya na pa
48b4: dpa' rgya mtsho gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon par gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med
48b5: p a'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du
48b6: gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
48b7: re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten
48b8: gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan
49a1: dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang go 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /
49a2: / 'jig
49a3: rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab gyi rdu rnams ni da tu nga gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gri bye brag rgya
49a4: mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon dbyung batho bdag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni
49a5: rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob
49a6: pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
49a7: r nams ni rab tu nyung gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dngaganan thob pa'i
49a8: stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
49b1: r nams ni rab tu nyung gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho pha rol tu phyin pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin
49b2: gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i
49b3: ' khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag sa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan
49b4: dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
49b5: ' khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho gzungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag gzungs kyi sgo bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang
49b6: gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
49b7: r e re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan
49b8: mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i
50a1: b yang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshonam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang bzhan thob pa de dag ni rnam par thang ba'i bya zag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs
50a2: pagazhan dang gzhan mthong bdag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga cu rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa' rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung ga/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
50a3: d kyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa'i bya brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin rlabs
50a4: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni chas mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub
50a5: s ems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs skyed pa'i byin gyi
50a6: rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang
50a7: c hub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs
50a8: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa te rten pa rnams dang / ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes rnams dang / spyod pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen nas// /
50b1: dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams dang / dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rnams dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnams dang / tshul khrims rnams dang / lung bstan pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag
50b2: la 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rnams dang / bskal la pa 'jug pa rnams dang /
50b3: dus gsum bstan pa rnams dang / dus gsum la 'jug pa rnams dang / mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / ye shes dbyer med pa rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / sangs rgyas rnams dang / kun du bzang
50b4: po'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos rnams dang snying rje chen po thob pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'bus par bya ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams
50b5: dang / yongs su dag pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / ye shes rjes su rtogs pa rnams dang / so sor rtogs pa rnams dang / stobs bskyed pa rnams dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyi lam rnams dang //
50b6: sangs rgyas kyi chos 'chang ba rnams dang / kun du bzung ba rnams dang / spobs pa rnams dang / ye shes kyi dbang rnams dang / gnas med pa rnams dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang / ye shes mngon par grub pa rnams
50b7: dang / sprul pa rnams dang / byin gyis rlabs pa rnams dang dbugs 'byin pa chen po rnyed pa rnams dang / zab mo la 'jug pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la rten pa rnams dang / sems bskyed pa bstan pa rnams dang / the tsom
50b8: thams cad gcod pa rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rnams dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / ldem po dag la mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug
51a1: pa rnams dang / zad par byargya cad rnamasan/ rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / rnam par grol ba rnams dang / skyed mos tshal rnams dang /
51a2: rin po che bkod pa rnams dang / mi spyod pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa mi gtong pa la gnas pa rnams dang / rgya mtsho lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug pa rnams dang / rin po che lta bu'i byang chub sems da
51a3: gnas pa rnams dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po go charnams dang / rtsom pa chen po rnams dang / rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa rnams dang / mi byed pa 'dad pa rnams dang lung brtan
51a4: pa rnams dang / dag pa'i rtsa ba yongs su sngob rnams dang / ye shes khong du chud pa rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rgya cha ba mtha' dang dbus med pa rnams dang / gter rnams dang / sdom pa rnams dang dang pa gyu sas/
51a5: zhing rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / chos rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / spyod yul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / ye shes rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa nam
51a6: par sprul pa rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / stobs rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / rnam par rol pa rnams dang / yul rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
51a7: chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / lus rnams dang / lus kyi las rnams dang / gzugs rnams dang / ngag gi las rnams dang / sems rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rnams dang / sems rgyas par byed pa rnams dang / dbang po
51a8: rnams dang / bsam pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams dang / sbyor ba rnams dang / mos pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / bag chags rnams dang / len pa rnams dang / nan tan
51b1: rnams dpa'agrub pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges pa rnams dang / theg pa rnams dang / mi 'gyur ba rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i chos rnams dang / nges par 'gyur ba'i lam rnams dang / skyes bu
51b2: dam pa'i ming thob pa rnams dang / lam rnams dang / lam gyi tshad rnams dang / lam gyi tshogs rnams dang / lam gyi sgom pa rnams dang / lam bkod pa thams cad la'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/
51b3: rnam par mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi snod chus gang shing / sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thams/
51b4: cad du snang ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin
51b5: du de bzhin gshegs pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling re rer sems can bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de dag gis gcig char mthong ste/ de
51b6: bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan zhing skra thogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin
51b7: gshegs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyi rlabs kyang / bstan par mi nus so// bam po lnga pa ste tha ma// 'jam dpal de ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i
51b8: yul ni dpes bstan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag dpe bshad pas don shes par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na mtsho dpag tshad 'bum sreg lnga pa bya rog gis btung du
52a1: rung bar mu dang khad chad du gyur pa/ pad ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs pa zhig yod la/ de la skyes bu la la zhig gis lcags kyi shing rta phang lo rtsib ma stong yod pa/ nam mkha' lding gi mgyogs pa bas kyang lhag
52a2: pa'i rta ba de lta bur mgyogs pas shing rta drangs te/ de ltar mgyogs pa'i shing rta drangs nas phang lo la'ang chus mi reg/ rta'i rmig pas kyang pad ma'i mdab ma mi rdol ba de lta bu'i shing rta nges drangs pa las/ mtsho chen po
52a3: de nas sbrul gdug pa steng du byung ste/ skad cig gang la shing rta sgyur ba'i skad cig de la sbrul gdug pa nges shing rta de lan bcur bskor te/ 'jam dpal skad cig gang gis sbrul gdug pas shing rta de lan cig bskor ba'i skad
52a4: cig de la dge slong kun dga' bos chos rnam pa bcu bstan pa bshad de don kyang rig par bya ste/ dge slong kun dga' bos skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la dge slong shA ri'i bus chos rnam pa
52a5: stong bstan pa bshad nas don kyang rig par byed do/ / dge slong shA ri'i bus skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la gnas brtan maud gal gyi bus 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri 'da'o// gnas
52a6: brtan maud gal gyi bus skad cig gang la 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'das pa'i skad cig de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi gling re re dga' ldan gyi gnas na
52a7: gnas pa las 'pho ba dang skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa dang / sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
52a8: dang / myang na las 'das pa chen po dang / chos gnas pa dang / chos nub pa dris gcig tu ston to// mu stegs can gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs thams cad du yang dus gcig tu snang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnye
52b1: thogs pa med pa dang / gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dbyer med pa dang me rten cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che bai dUr+ya las dngos po'i dbang gas gzhan du ma dpa' bya ba dag 'byung ste/
52b2: bai dUr+ya ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang 'thun pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba gzhan du med pa dag 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
52b3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las kyang sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dbang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du gcig tu skad cig skad cig la/ mdzad pa gzhan du
52b4: med pa dag 'byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ni rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa'adi lta bu 'di dag 'byung ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam
52b5: dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling du sdod chus bkang ba sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thams cad du gcig char du snang yang gnas nas mi g.yo'o// de bzhin du de bzhin
52b6: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du sems can sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa de dag bsam pa ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'dul
52b7: de bzhin du dezhin gsheg pa mthong ste de zhin gshegs pa ni dag ldan gnas gsogs pa yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du mdzad pa rtsom pa thams cad kyang snang ngo // de ci'i phyir/
52b8: zhen/ mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rab dang 'bring dang / tha ma'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi 'du byed rab 'bring tha ma dag 'byung ste/
53a1: 'du byed ni mi tog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'du byed de dag ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de me tog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo // de bzhin du rnam par smin pa tha ma dang /
53a2: 'bring dang / rab kyi dbang gis sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab tu mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni me tog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir
53a3: mi rtog cing spyan gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang gyu 'o/ / 'jam dpal 'di skye ste/ dper na sbyin las ro gcig pa'i char 'bab ste/ bab nas snod kyi bye brag gis kha dog sna tshogs dang / drisna tshogs su gyur/
53a4: sprin ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi
53a5: dbyings kyi ro gcig ste/ de sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i dbang gis chos kyi dbyings tha dad par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam
53a6: par mi rtog cing / lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang lcags kyi yo byad rnams mi byung ngo // de ci'i
53a7: phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gang du byung ba der me'i 'od rnams dang / blo donasapa mi byung // de nyi ma da nams mi byung // na nu'i do rnams mi 'byung ngo // deng lha dang klu dang
53a8: gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten sbyar ba'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo // dang rgyal po rnams kyi bka' mi 'byung ngo //
53b1: der rigs bzhi rnams mi 'byung ngo ro// der mi khom par skye ba rnams mi 'byung ngo // deng sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnams mi 'byung ngo // der mi dge ba bcu'i
53b2: las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung ngo / / der nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // dang mu stegs can spyod pa ba dang kun du rgyu ba dang / gcer bu dang / 'tsho ba pa rnams mi 'byung ste//
53b3: de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i zhing yul tshogs pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo // 'jam
53b4: dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub
53b5: pa'i ye shes ni 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang /
53b6: skad cig skad cigal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang / rnam par gnas pa dang / 'jug pa dus gcig tu 'byung ba dag ni ches mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//
53b7: 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pas phyogs
53b8: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re re sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag rtsom par sbyor ba dang / las dang bzo'i gnas thams cad la sbyor ba dga' byung ba ni ches mang ste/ de bzhin
54a1: gshegs pa ni mi tog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig
54a2: rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad ni mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bya ba thams cad gang ci 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis
54a3: grub pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ngo ro/ / de ci'i byer zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpa' 'di sa ste/ dper nas la rten/ sa la gnas nas sa bon thams cad dang / rtsa dang shing gal ba dang / rtse dang dgas tshal
54a4: thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas la yas par 'gyur te/ sa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo 'jam
54a5: dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa
54a6: mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas pa yangs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam
54a7: par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na gang dag zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman la reg pa
54a8: de dag gi zug rngu thams cad 'byin te/ zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // /
54b1: 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag tha na de bzhin gshegs pa ri mor bris pa 'am/ glegs bam la bris pa la reg kyang rung ste/ rgyungs de dag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad
54b2: kyi zug rngu 'byin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi tog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam pa me tog cing ldan gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di
54b3: lta ste/ dper na rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/
54b4: 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bsan/
54b5: pa gang 'dod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro zhing chos bstan pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa las nyan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir
54b6: rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin
54b7: gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'jig
54b8: rten kye khams re re dang / rdul phra rab rerare dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag la 'jug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re'i yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
55a1: grangs med pa bye ba khrag grags tu steng phrag sa bcu rdul pa dab kyi rdul rnams ni dug/ zung // de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams chags na da pargyal chathas med pa'i bya brag bstan pa rnam
55a2: gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pasgrib pa med pa/ dbyed med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mthi'i chu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag na ches mang ngo //
55a3: de bzhin du ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ ma 'dres pa/ nam mkha'i kham
55a4: rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs mang ba'i bye bag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig sa cig
55a5: la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go de bzhin dus rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa
55a6: rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin
55a7: du gzungs rgya mtsho gangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'
55a8: mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ / de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/
55b1: nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig
55b2: la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med
55b3: pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa
55b4: ngag go/ / de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par
55b5: 'gengs pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ / de bzhin du smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa
55b6: dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das
55b7: pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho
55b8: grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis/
56a1: rlob pa dag go/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig las 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/
56a2: nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig
56a3: mad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa
56a4: rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par
56a5: byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyed med pa/
56a6: nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go// de bzhin du bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig/
56a7: la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
56a8: thams cad na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi bams rgya mtsho gang dag yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu re rer 'jig cing chags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos
56b1: brnyes pa'i phyir ro/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par phyi ma'i mthi'i mu'i gal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin
56b2: gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/
56b3: de bzhin du gtsug gtor gyis kyang gzigs so// de bzhin du mdzod spus kyang gzigs so// de bzhin du mtshan re res kyang gzigs so// de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re res kyang gzigs so// de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re res kyang
56b4: gzigs so/ / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba dag dus gcig tu gzigs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin
56b5: gshegs pa'i kun du gzigs pa mdor bshad pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal bar byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa ni 'jam dpal da
56b6: bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
56b7: mtsho dag 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gli nga re rer 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i
56b8: khams rgyas par 'gengs pa thams cad 'byung ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du zhing rnam par 'phrul
57a1: ba dang / chos rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku rnam par 'phrul pa dang / smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par 'phrul pa
57a2: dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / stobs rnam par 'phrul pa de lta bu la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i
57a3: khams rgyas par 'gengs pa dag skad cig skad cig la 'byung ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byan gyis rlob pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//
57a4: 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i gagal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyed med cing
57a5: miganas pa ni 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi mas na dpa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gling 'di na tha dad la gling gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin
57a6: gshegs pa khyim 'di na tha dadapal byam gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i ris 'di na tha dad la lha'i ris gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba 'di na tha dad la
57a7: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa yi dgas kyi 'gro ba 'di na tha dad la yi dgas kyi 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro
57a8: pa 'di na tha dad la sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i khams na tha dad la gzugs kyi khams su gnas pa ma yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i
57b1: dbyer med cing mi gnas pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i gas par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig
57b2: rtenyon gyi khams rab 'byam dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag yod pa de dag ni nam mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/ dus gsum gyi phyogs mtha' yas pa dag na rgyal ba'i gtsug gtor 'byung ba dang / 'jig par snang ba rgyal
57b3: ba'i gtsug tor gyi mtha' ni phyogs rnams na mi rnyed do/ / de dag ni nam mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/ de bzhin du rgyal ba'i mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / de bzhin du
57b4: spu'i khung bu re re'i mtha' ni phyogs rnams na mi rnyed do/ / lha dang mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi tshul bstan pa ji lta bus 'dul ba de dag gis chos kyi tshul bstan pa de 'dra ba dag 'byung bar shes te/ de la lha dang /
57b5: me dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor las bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
57b6: bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so//
57b7: kha cig gis ni gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin tu mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bsan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// gcig gis ni rnam par thar pa
57b8: rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / kha cig gis ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho
58a1: grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / kha cig gis ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med
58a2: pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / kha cig gis ni dbugs 'byin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
58a3: bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug
58a4: pargya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / kha cig gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni bskal pa la 'jug
58a5: pargya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / kha cig gis ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni dus gsum bstan brgya
58a6: mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / kha cig gis ni mi skye ba'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// lha dang mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig
58a7: gis ni gtsug tor nas dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / de bzhin du lha dang mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba zhid thams
58a8: cad kyi rdul snyed dag gis sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la de bzhin du mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas chos tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bye
58b1: brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so//
58b2: 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ni 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na rdul phra rab kyi rdul yod pa ni rab tu nyung gi
58b3: debazhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag ni ches mang ngo / / de la byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni pag
58b4: tshad bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bca'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad ba phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang /
58b5: bzhi bcu'o// 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong ngo // 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang lnga bcwo
58b6: byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ne
58b7: dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag stong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga
58b8: bcu yod de/ de dag thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / gling thams cad na dus gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyis gyur du mthong ngo // 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems
59a1: dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa gang la la zhig sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi gom par 'dor bas steng gi phyogs logs su song
59a2: ste/ gom par res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug tshal zhing / de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor song
59a3: yang der yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyis gyur du mthong ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi
59a4: ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
59a5: rab 'byam thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la de bzhin gshegs pa sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams
59a6: ni ches mang ngo / / 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la de bzhin gshegs pa sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas ji snyed pa de bas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
59a7: sku la 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho 'byung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrogs pa dag ches mang ngo / / sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la de bzhin du gtsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan re re dang / dpe byad bzang po re re dang /
59a8: spu'i phung bu re re nas zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho dag 'byung ste/ de la 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya
59b1: mtsho grangs med pa rjes su srog go/ / 'od zer rgya mtsho ba cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig nis rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su srog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho ba cig ni ting nge 'dzin
59b2: rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ / 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho ba cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer
59b3: rgya mtsho ba cig ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ / 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes
59b4: su sgrog go/ / 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha
59b5: cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho la cig ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig
59b6: ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs
59b7: med pa rjes su sgrog go/ / 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha
59b8: cig ni ye shes tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog ste/ thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob po// 'dam dpal
60a1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ spyod pa'i gnas rnams mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so//
60a2: 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa la mi 'jigs pa ni/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i skad cig skad cig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad ni
60a3: zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rgya mtsho dag dus gcig tu rdul gcig la yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / de la sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i
60a4: ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha
60a5: rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni sa tha dad pa rgya mtshe grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su
60a6: smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med
60a7: pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya
60a8: mtshakha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni mngon par shes pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye
60b1: zug na pangs nas byam sangs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rnamatshab cagan sngon lasag dad pa/ ma tshagrangs sa pa'i bya brag bstan pams shes byas yangs su smin par mdzad do// sems can tu mtsha can
60b2: ni bcan 'bras tsam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsha grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can tu mtshab cig de dbugs 'byin pa ded pa thad da pa rgyamatsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan
60b3: ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rgya mtshal cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgyam tsha grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems can
60b4: rgyam tsho bcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rgya mtshol cig ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la
60b5: 'jug pa pa dad pa rgyamatshe grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rgya mtshol cig ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsha grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan
60b6: pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rgya mtshal cig ni bskal ba la 'jug pa tha dad pa grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// de bzhin du dus gsum la 'jug
60b7: ba dang / dus gsum bstan pa dang mi skye ba'i sems bskyed pa dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do de bzhin du sems can rnam par sprul pa dang / zhing rnam par sprul pa dang / chos rnam par sprul pa dang /
60b8: las rnam par sprul pa dang / sngon lam rnam par sprul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par sprul pa dang / ye shes rnam par sprul pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dang / stobs rnam par
61a1: sprul pas rnam par rol pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la/ sems can rgya mtsho zhing thams cad kyi rdul rnyed dag rdul gcig la yongs
61a2: su smin par mdzad do/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa la mi 'jigs pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par
61a3: mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can dag nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas
61a4: robargya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi rten pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa gcig la
61a5: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa la bslabs pa'o/ / snyam du bsams nas nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
61a6: mo gad la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi rten pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge slong dag la ni shi bzhin du lha'i zas
61a7: re brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge slong gcig la nyin gcig zan byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par
61a8: skyed do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge slong dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan
61b1: pabyin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dang bas rjes su 'brang ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin ka/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed
61b2: do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams rdul snyed kyi dang bas rjes su 'brang ba dag la nyin cig
61b3: bzhin du lha'i ga zas ro rgya ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byen pa pas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches/
61b4: bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag la nyin
61b5: gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis brgyad pa gcig la nyin cig zan gcig byin na
61b6: 'di dngas ches bsod nams gangs med par byed do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal ba gang gA'i glang ge bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul byed kyi brgyad pa dag
61b7: ga ga bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan 'khyen pa dang / de bzhin du lha rigs rnams sbyin pa byin pa pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi tha ma gzhan gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig za ca
61b8: 'di ni dbas chas bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig tan gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun du zhum
62a1: bdag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas rob rgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin papas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis lan gcig phyir 'ang
62a2: gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams
62a3: thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas robargya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig
62a4: kis phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
62a5: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi phyir mi 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa pas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
62a6: gzhan gang zhig gis/ dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang ga'i
62a7: kluglang gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu
62a8: 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis//
62b1: bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa pas/ rigs/
62b2: kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa'am/ gzugs su byas pa mthong na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed na/ thal mo sbyor ba 'am/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am spos
62b3: sam/ mar me 'bul ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gnan gang la she gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas bcom
62b4: ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul ba dang / de bzhin du lha'i na bza' rnams phul ba bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
62b5: gzhan gang gis tha na phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyi ma gcig zan
62b6: gcig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gos bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems
62b7: dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis
62b8: glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tho na nyin gcig zan cig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
63a1: med par skyed do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad/
63a2: kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus
63a3: 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig zan gcig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed de// 'jam dpal
63a4: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du zla ba dang / nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du
63a5: lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin
63a6: gcig zan byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub
63a7: sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa sbyin pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
63a8: bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi
63b1: b u'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin cig bzhin
63b2: du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog
63b3: pa 'di ni debs ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ / bzlog ste ste stang ma byas pa'i dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / glang po che'i
63b4: shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'ang de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
63b5: kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bar chad byas pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
63b6: rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang / brnyas pa'i sems bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs
63b7: med par skyed do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi mig phyung nas bdeg pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/
63b8: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed de/ gshe ba dang / mi snyan par smra ba dang / snyogs par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang du skyed do// 'jam dpal
64a1: rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci yang rung bas brnyas pa bskyed de spyos na/ de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye
64a2: pabar 'gyur te/ de la mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro// de'i mgo re re la yang kha lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/ de'i kha re re la yang lce lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lce re re la yang gshol lnga brgya lnga brgya rmo bar 'gyur
64a3: ro/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la dbyug pa dang mtshon gyis bsnun te bdog pa thams
64a4: cad phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas khro ba dang gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khros pa'i sems skyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches
64a5: sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
64a6: dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re ren dgra bcom pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog gcod pa dang / rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i stegs bus yongs su bskor cing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
64a7: lha'i ba dan btsugs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bshig pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po nyid la sgro btags
64a8: te brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas/ rkyen cis kyang rung khro ba dang / gshe ba dang / mi snyan par zer ba dang / khyad du gsod par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpal
64b1: las de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// gang byang chub sems dpa' la skur ba des chos spangs pa yin no// chos kyang gzhan la chos yongs su
64b2: 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid chos so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
64b3: sems can thams cad btson mun gnag dag tu bcug pa pas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la khros te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyis phyogs shing 'dug nas ma rungs pa 'di ma blta'o zhes zer na 'di ni de
64b4: bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub
64b5: sems dpa' ji lta bu yang rung ba la smad na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab kyis 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang / che bas ri thams
64b6: cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pas kyang 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang / che bas phyogs bcu dag na byang
64b7: chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed yod pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol du phyin pa lnga las byung ba bskal pa grangs med par bsags pa zil gyis mnan
64b8: nas/ lham me/ lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa bas// 'jam
65a1: dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis phung po med pa'i gzhal mos na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal gal te sems can thams cad phung po med pa'i gzhil
65a2: mos par gyur ba bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la momo ga yon mang pa zhir 'bri ba dang / yi ge 'bring 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / klog tu 'jug pa dang / than
65a3: glegs bam du bris pa la mos nas 'dzin par byed cing mar me dang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod par byed na/ 'di ni de bas chas bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal
65a4: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs
65a5: pa re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du med pa grangs med pa rnams dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud gsan pabs/ gzhan gang zhig gis
65a6: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig chud zos par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed na/ gshe ba dang mi snyan par smra ba lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
65a7: gis mchod rten gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bshig pa dang bsreg pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang khro ba'i
65a8: sems bskyed de/ gshe ba dang mi snyan par smras na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges par byung la sangs rgyas las
65b1: mchod rten rnams byung zhing / sangs rgyas las 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha'i ris thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byung la/ sangs rgyas kyang byang chub sems dpa' las byung bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' la//
65b2: sti stang ma byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stad ma byas pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la sti stang byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stang byas pa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bla na med pas
65b3: mchod pa byed 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod par bya'o/ / 'jam dpal gal te grong khyer la la zhig na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya'am/ bye ba stong ngam/ bye ba brgya stong ngam/ gzhal du med pa grangs med
65b4: pa dag yod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lam mos na/ de dag gi las ni rgyal po 'khrug par 'gyur ba 'am/ chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mu ges 'khrug
65b5: par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ro// grong khyer chen po de na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yod na de'i las ni
65b6: bskal pa grangs med par mtshams med pa'i gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / grong khyer der 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag las rgyal po 'khrug par 'gyur ba mi 'byung / chus 'khrug par 'grur
65b7: pa'i las mi 'byung / chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / mugs 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / kla klos 'khrug par 'gyung ba'i las mi byung / chos kyi
65b8: nam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i las bskal pa rgya mtsho grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang / yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur ba yod na der 'khrug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
66a1: de'i las bskal pa grangs med pa brjod du med par mtshams med par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i las bskal pa bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba yang tshe 'di la myong ste/ 'khrug
66a2: pas byed par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyar dpag tshad brgya ba'i rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang la dug srang stong yang mi
66a3: 'dug par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i phung po chen pos rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi nang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las
66a4: rab tu med pa yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang byang chub sems
66a5: dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang sa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do//
66a6: 'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sa rin dra bo di dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba pan de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pab
66a7: pa'o/ / 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ni ya ta a ni ya ta ga ti mu drA a ba tA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
66a8: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril dge slong stong nyis rgya lnga bcu'i dge slong
66b1: gi dge dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba thag khrig 'dus phrag drug bcul 'di sa ste/ 'jam dpas gzhan dur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / kru tshan tho pa dang / sman gyi rgyal ba dang / sku
66b2: kyigyis yang dga'aphags dang / mchod rten mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra skad rgyal po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrag 'bum phrag drug bcu thams cad kyang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa 'tsha 'phrul gyi ting
66b3: de'adzin la gnas pa/ zab cing brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dris rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa'i gzungs thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig
66b4: bu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgyagang gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tus
66b5: nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes
66b6: bgyi bar bdag gis 'chal bar 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgyal 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
66b7: kyis 'das dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lnga po 'di dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste thugs kyi shing tas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i
66b8: shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu ste/ 'jam dpal lnga po de dag ci byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
67a1: 'gro ba yin no/ / 'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
67a2: chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no/ / 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las slar ldog pa
67a3: dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyis
67a4: ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldeg pa yin no// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu ma dang byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi
67a5: rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba lta bu pa 'di gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog
67a6: pa yin no/ / 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na skyes bul la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi
67a7: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'da' bar 'dod la der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab gcig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig
67a8: rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ / de yang 'di snyam du spyod de/ mal bdag phrugs kyi shing rta la zhon la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam ste/ 'jam dpal mi de phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te/ lab de
67b1: zhugs nas de yun ring zhing dus ring mo zhig na/ dpag tshad brgyad phyin pa las de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlog nas dpag tshad brgyad bcur phyir ded de phul na 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems mi des bskal pa/
67b2: gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong dam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang
67b3: 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/ phyugs kyi shing rtal 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya
67b4: 'am/ bskal pa stod dam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
67b5: bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la theg pa chen po mi 'dzin mi klog par nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /
67b6: lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la kun du spyod cing longs spyod par byed la kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang dam/ 'chag sar
67b7: spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/ de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
67b8: skrod pa mngon par 'du byed pa des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go// byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes
68a1: rab kyi mag gang yin pa de yang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rdul por byed cing nyams par byed do/ / 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig mig nang
68a2: kyis mig zum par gyur nas/ de mig dbye ba dang 'dzums su rung bar bya ba'i phyir zla ba gcig gi bar du spyad bas te/ zla ba gcig lon nas mig 'byed cing 'dzums par byed pa las/ da'i dgra'am/ me mdza' ba gzhan zhig
68a3: gis pi pi ling dge phye ma spar gang gis mig bkang nas de yang long bar byas pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig
68a4: gang yin pa de yang da nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed de/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro//
68a5: blta bu pa yin par reg par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar
68a6: 'dod la der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang don chen po dang / ched cha ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya
68a7: skam mo/ de yang 'di snyam du dpyod do// mal bdag glang po che'i shing ta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba sna gong ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal med grang pa che'i shing ta yan lag brgyad
68a8: dang ldan pa la zhon te lam der zhugs nas de lo brgyas dpag tshad nyis stong du son pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas phyir phul te bzlog na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems glang po che'i shing rta la zhon pa'i mi des
68b1: bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal
68b2: gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/ glang po che'i shing rta 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal
68b3: pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin
68b4: du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la bsnyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur
68b5: byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la kun du spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha tod
68b6: byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug par byed cing kha ton byed du 'jug la yongs su sbyor bar byed du 'jug na/ de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des
68b7: shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i shes rab
68b8: kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de yang de'i nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do/ / 'jam dpal dper na shing ge sdong po chen po srid
